openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Simple API Overview
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  "/":
    get:
      operationId: listVersionsv2
      summary: List API versions
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 200 response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/my_schema"
              example: "true"
components:
  schemas:
    my_schema:
      type: string
security:
  - exampleSecurity: []
